crazyballrun.game.gui.interfaces

Interface IControlSubscriber

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CBButton, CBLevelDescription, CBListBox

    public interface IControlSubscriber
    Each class (usually used for GUIControls) implementing this interface may register at a IControlObserver by referencing its id (has to be in the same GUIFrame).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean notify(java.lang.Object event, IControlObserver sender)
      Notifies an IControlSubscriber of an event (like selection changed, scrollbar position changed, ...).

    • Method Detail

      • notify

        boolean notify(java.lang.Object event,
             IControlObserver sender)
        Notifies an IControlSubscriber of an event (like selection changed, scrollbar position changed, ...).
        Parameters:
        event - reference to the event description
        sender - reference to the sender
        Returns:
        'true' if the notification has been accepted.
